snippet.title: Who is Abby - First Person Mystery Adventure Puzzle Game Available Now in Early Access on Steam
snippet.description:
🕵️ In Who is Abby, players step into a narrative-driven experience that melds the immersive exploration of walking simulators with the intricate interactivity of point-and-click adventures. Delve into Tom's relentless search for answers in a world shrouded in mystery and ambiguity. As each chapter unfolds, secrets emerge from the shadows, pulling you deeper into Tom's quest to understand the enigma surrounding Abby. 🧩

🔗 Grab it discounted on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614800/Who_is_Abby/
🌐 Discover more: https://www.whoisabbygame.com
💬 Connect with our community and share your thoughts on Discord: https://discord.gg/R7VhZPEqkm"

#steamgames  #adventuregame  #puzzlegame  #mysterygames  #WhoIsAbby #newrelease  #JourneyWithTom
